item.title: I know where you’ll be on July 24
item.description: You’ll be in Grove Park in Grafton, Illinois, for: ALTON IL. T.E.A PARTY FIRST ANNIVERSARY “1776 FREEDOM RALLY” Saturday, July 24th 4pm-7pm Think about it. You’ve Fast Eddie’s right there. You’ve got two of the most haunted towns in America with Grafton and Alton. Great history, including homes that were critical to the Underground Railroad. [Map of Grafton] In short, you get to help make history in a place where history was made.
